categories.name: Copper geometry
categories.description: Trace widths, clearances, annular rings, copper balancing, slivers and general photolithography or etch related constraints.

categories.name: Drill and via integrity
categories.description: Drill sizes, via annular rings, aspect ratio, spacing, tenting, and other drill process constraints.

categories.name: Solder mask and silkscreen
categories.description: Mask openings, mask clearance, mask webbing, silkscreen printability, and mask defined pad constraints.

categories.name: Fabrication stackup
categories.description: Dielectric thickness, material specs, layer registration, impedance controlled structures, and copper to edge constraints.

categories.name: Mechanical and outline
categories.description: Board outline, milling, slots, corner radii, tabs, mousebites, and mechanical drill features.

categories.name: Assembly
categories.description: Component spacing, polarity, reflow considerations, paste area, tombstoning, and wave solder constraints.

categories.name: Thermal and power integrity
categories.description: Thermal reliefs, copper areas for heat dissipation, plane fragmentation, and via in pad thermal management.

categories.name: High speed and signal integrity
categories.description: Differential pair spacing and skew, return path continuity, stub length, and crosstalk prediction.

categories.name: Fabrication process compatibility
categories.description: Non standard hole types, missing tooling, silkscreen issues, and aperture definition errors.

categories.name: Yield prediction
categories.description: Quantitative estimates of etch margin, drill wander tolerance, and plating thickness uniformity.
